reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater pretty and soft, with one mentioning it's not itchy at all. The size runs very large according to multiple reviews. The pilling aspect receives mixed feedback, with one customer reporting issues after the first wash.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: Such a cute sweater! Soft and not itchy at all. I’ve gotten so many complements after wearing it for the first time. It is a bit off an oversized fit but I found it perfect. Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow
items.body: Wow ! This sweater is far and above any sweater you could buy at the most expensive store . The embroidery is just indescribably beautiful and the quality is stunning . I had to return the large and I ordered a medium . I listened to other reviewers that the size was right on; for me size was not right on. I had to go down one size . And I don’t like things tight. I tend toward more roomy. But I love it so much I had to wait for the medium to arrive before I returned it. Read more
items.author: Donitta

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice sweater that’s reminiscent of big box store quality
items.body: I thought this ZESICA floral cardigan was adorable. I ordered the blue color in a size small after viewing the provided size chart. I feel the fit is true to size and the color is represented accurately in the listing. The design of this sweater is adorable, but the finished product leaves something to be desired. I should have paid more attention to the fabric content, as I feel the fabric of the sweater looks cheap, in person. The flowers are what made the sweater so appealing to me, but on my sweater, the center of each flower is stitched on rather sloppily. I don’t know that I consider that a dealbreaker for purchasing the sweater, but it is an observance that I felt deserves to be mentioned. The button holes are very small, but that doesn’t seem to hinder the ability to button the sweater. I washed the sweater by putting it in a large delicates bag on a gentle cycle, and then I draped it over a drying rack to air dry. It laundered well and retained its shape. Overall, it’s a nice sweater and pairs especially well with jeans, but could be worn more dressy with slacks or a skirt. I’m torn on a recommendation for the sweater at its original $39.99 price…the price when I ordered it. But, the price of the blue sweater at the time of my review is a Limited Time Deal of $27.99, which I feel is more in alignment with the quality of the garment. Hence, the quality is not bad, but it is about what I’d expect to pay for a full price sweater at the big box store that starts with a “W”. MY RATING SCALE: * I can’t believe this product/item is even available for sale on Amazon. There are so many issues with it that I can’t recommend it to anyone. Do not purchase. ** Product/item doesn’t meet my expectations. I wish I would’ve passed on ordering it. I certainly wouldn’t order it again. There are multiple issues and I can not recommend it. Potential buyers order at your own discretion. *** An average item/product. I like it, I might or might not reorder it, and if I recommend it, it’s with stipulations. There are one or more issues with the product/item, but nothing so major that the product isn’t useful. **** A good product/item. I like it, I’d likely reorder it, and I recommend it. In my opinion it has a minor issue, but nothing I can’t overlook. ***** A GREAT product/item. I love it…I’d definitely reorder it and I highly recommend it! I have absolutely nothing negative to say about it. Read more
items.author: KsCuzin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Runs huge but I kept because it’s a very cute sweater. I needed an XS but only comes in Small. Read more
items.author: Daisy Duke

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but flower coming off
items.body: Very cute sweater.. Would size down.. I had to return because one of the flowers was coming off.. Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and well made
items.body: I love this sweater! Super soft and cute! Read more
items.author: Micky and Daniel Belinski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for fall
items.body: I love this sweater, it is very soft and warm. I've only worn it once so far but have received several compliments on it. Read more
items.author: treethack

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too bad
items.body: I loved the design but I could not get past the fabric. I was afraid to stand near an open flame. I returned it. In fact, felt the fabric and didn’t even take it out of the bag. Too bad. Super cute sweater. Read more
items.author: Marc

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pink, White, Blue, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
